General.Name: PT Dafam Property Indonesia Tbk
General.Description: PT Dafam Property Indonesia Tbk engages in the property development activities in Indonesia. The company operated through: Hotel, Real Estate, and Hotel Management Services divisions. It develops commercial, residential, hotel, and resort properties; and provides hotel management services. In addition, it rents hotel and office building. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Semarang, Indonesia. PT Dafam Property Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Dafam.
